mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK (WCODE, WTITLE, WCONTENT, WEND, ENO, WDATE, WSTATUS, DNO) VALUES (#{wcode}, #{wtitle}, #{wcontent}, #{wend}, #{eno}, SYSDATE, '진행중', #{dno})
mapper.select: SELECT W.*, E1.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, E2.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO WHERE W.WCODE = #{wcode}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET WSTATUS = 'ING' WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
UPDATE WORK SET WSTATUS = #{status} WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
UPDATE WORKMANAGER SET ANSWER = #{answer} WHERE WCODE = #{wcode} AND ENO = #{eno}
mapper.select: SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, E1.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, E2.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO WHERE W.ENO = #{eno} OR W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{eno}

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WSTATUS, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.MANAGER_ENO, W.REQUESTER_ENO, E1.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, E2.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO WHERE W.MANAGER_ENO = #{value} OR W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{value} ORDER BY W.WDATE DESC

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.REQUESTER_ENO, W.MANAGER_ENO, E1.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, E2.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WSTATUS, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.MANAGER_ENO, W.REQUESTER_ENO, E1.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, E2.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO WHERE W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{value} ORDER BY W.WDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET WTITLE = #{wtitle}, WCONTENT = #{wcontent}, WDATE = #{wdate}, WEND = #{wend}, WOPEN = #{wopen}, WALARM = #{walarm}, WSTATUS = #{wstatus}, DNO = #{dno} WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
mapper.select: SELECT R.WRNO, R.WCODE, R.ENO, R.WRCONTENT, R.WRREGDATE, E.NAME AS WRITERNAME FROM WORKREPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.ENO = E.ENO WHERE R.WCODE = #{wcode} ORDER BY R.WRREGDATE DESC
SELECT R.WRNO, R.WCODE, R.ENO, R.WRCONTENT, R.WRREGDATE, E.NAME AS WRITERNAME FROM WORKREPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.ENO = E.ENO WHERE R.WRNO = #{wrno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKREPLY (WRNO, WCODE, ENO, WRCONTENT, WRREGDATE) VALUES (WORKREPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{wcode}, #{eno}, #{wrcontent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, R.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, M.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE R ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = R.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON W.MANAGER_ENO = M.ENO WHERE W.DNO = #{dno}
SELECT WM.WCODE, WM.ENO, E.NAME FROM WORKMANAGER WM JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON WM.ENO = E.ENO WHERE WM.WCODE = #{wcode}

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, W.REQUESTER_ENO, W.MANAGER_ENO, W.ANSWER, E1.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, E2.NAME AS MANAGERNAME, S.STATUS_NAME AS STATUSNAME FROM WORK W JOIN EMPLOYEE E1 ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = E1.ENO JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON W.MANAGER_ENO = E2.ENO JOIN STATUS_TABLE S ON W.WSTATUS = S.STATUS_CODE

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, R.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, M.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE R ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = R.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON W.MANAGER_ENO = M.ENO WHERE (W.ENO = #{eno} OR W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{eno}) AND W.WSTATUS = 'PENDING'

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, R.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, M.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE R ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = R.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON W.MANAGER_ENO = M.ENO WHERE (W.ENO = #{eno} OR W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{eno}) AND W.WSTATUS = 'WAITING'

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, R.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, M.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE R ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = R.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON W.MANAGER_ENO = M.ENO WHERE (W.ENO = #{eno} OR W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{eno}) AND W.WDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')+6

SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, R.NAME AS REQUESTERNAME, M.NAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE R ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = R.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON W.MANAGER_ENO = M.ENO WHERE (W.ENO = #{eno} OR W.REQUESTER_ENO = #{eno})
